title: Type Battle 25: Design the 2008 Typophile Tee
content:
UPDATE: This weeks' battle is **[The 2008 Typophile Tee Contest](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023205147/http:/typophile.com/typophile_tee_contest_2008)**. There's only 1 week, so get on it.

EARLIER: Stay tuned for next weeks' Type Battle. We've got something up our _sleeves_.
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content:
yeh... type batlle!!!  
I have been waiting for this since i joined!

No clue on that hint thou!
based on the clue, maybe a TATTOO type battle?

Or records..  
Or clothes..  
Or a tube into which another tube is inserted..

Whatever it is I already have committed to using hot dogs in my entry.
Haley, you were correct ... Tee battle :)
